name: dr^k magazine ownership title
description: Directed by Alonso Cedillo, Daniela Gil Esteva, Laos Salazar, and Karla Hernández, dr^k.mx (2011-2014) pioneered independent internet journalism in the field of contemporary art, by documenting in Spanish the artistic practice of over 100 artists. This ownership title is split into 4 editions, each one of them holded by a member of the team. Own the four and you'll own the project (hosting not included). A backup copy of the files can be found on the IPFS. Contact me via twitter before buying.
